Encounter.Name: Contact Corsairs
Encounter.DescriptionText: You hail the corsair captain. After a few short moments a crackling voice comes over the subspace communicator:

Message.Text:
Hello SING scum,
So you are here to pay your protection money like a good boy? It will Cost you MONEY credits this time, "friend".
Captain Martok

Response.Text: Change your mind and tell them to bug off.

Message.Text: Why, thank you. These credits look shiny
Unfortunately for your freighters, you do not had enough money.
